definition: dense/thick (fog, clouds etc)/to have a strong interest in/deep/fully saturated (color)
thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress

sentences.english: I am a F. 5 student who is so fond of keeping pets.
sentences.chinese: 本人是一名中五學生，從小對飼養寵物有濃厚興趣。

sentences.english: Then ashot of thick coffee is poured on top.
sentences.chinese: 最後倒上一份香醇濃厚的咖啡。

sentences.english: Her hands delighted in the thick hair that covered his chest.
sentences.chinese: 她的手在他濃厚的胸毛裏歡快得很。

sentences.english: Bouquet: Excellent concentration. Berry nose with vanilla flavours and complex oakiness.
sentences.chinese: 濃醇度，芳香帶濃厚果味，有香料和煙的香氣。

sentences.english: This painting had pronounced national color.
sentences.chinese: 這幅畫具有濃厚的民族色彩。

sentences.english: Marinade during cooking to be a strong, tight package shrimp for tasty.
sentences.chinese: 烹製時滷汁要濃厚，緊包對蝦，以便入味。

sentences.english: Their fervency is originated from deepness to computer industry interest in job .
sentences.chinese: 他們對工作的熱情源自對計算機行業的濃厚興趣。

sentences.english: Zhao’s works are inspirational and convey a strong sense of Asian philosophy and aesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 趙的作品甚能鼓舞人心，表達濃厚的亞洲哲學及美學。

sentences.english: Are foreign firms as keen on Asia as they claim to be?
sentences.chinese: 外國企業是否如其所言對亞洲興趣濃厚？

sentences.english: Beautiful purple color of a deep intensity.
sentences.chinese: 此酒成漂亮深紫色，深邃濃厚。

sentences.english: For work-related direct and indirect interest in the field.
sentences.chinese: 對於工作有直接和間接相關的領域有濃厚的興趣。

sentences.english: A thick-whipped elegant moisturizing cream for cleansing and facial make-up removal.
sentences.chinese: 用於潔面和臉部卸妝的一種濃厚的保溼霜狀產品。

sentences.english: Katherine could smell the high sweet scent of marijuana.
sentences.chinese: 凱瑟琳可以聞到大麻濃厚的甜蜜芬香。

sentences.english: He is also increasingly interested in culture and is more health-conscious.
sentences.chinese: 他們對文化的興趣更加濃厚，也更加註重健康。

sentences.english: Great pepper oil, also known as pepper, the dry goods for the red sauce, deep flavor.
sentences.chinese: 大花椒又稱油椒，其幹品爲醬紅色，香味濃厚。

sentences.english: Naiwei tea, incense slip strong taste.
sentences.chinese: 茶香奶味，滑香濃厚的口感。

definition: to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
